change_module_desc.text: Allows you to switch to a different menu.

wrong_module_number.text: Wrong module number. Please, try again!

negative_id_error.text: An id cannot be a negative number!

enter_to_leave.text: If you decide to exit the program, enter

enter_back_p2.text: to return to the previous menu

cancel.text: Cancels the execution of the current command (e.g. create/edit/sort_files)

please_enter_p3.text: , if you want to add it later

create_desc.text: Adds a new record to the contact book. You can add a name, a phone, a birthday, an address, an email - either when creating a record, or later.

check_birthdays_desc.text: Displays a list of contacts, who have a birthday in the specified perioud.

edit_desc.text: Edits the name/birthday/email/address/phone numbers of a contact. Adds a new phone number.

choose_contact_to_edit.text: number of a contact you want to edit

choose_contact_to_remove.text: number of a contact you want to delete

enter_edit.text: what you are going to edit

enter_remove.text: what you are going to remove

edit_phone_desc.text: Edits the phone number of a contact.

choose_contact_phone.text: phone number, which you are going to edit

add_phone_desc.text: Adds a new phone number to the contact.

phone_number_add.text: phone number, which you are going to add

find_desc.text: Looks for a specified text in the contacts.

remove_desc.text: Removes the name/birthday/email/address/phone number of the contact, or the contact itself.

remove_phone_desc.text: Deletes one of the phone numbers of the chosen contact.

choose_phone_to_delete.text: the phone number you are going to delete

show_all_desc.text: Displays the contents of the contact book.

invalid_day_error.text: Error! Number of days must be a valid number

found_birthdays_p0.text: Contacts, which have a birthday in the next

not_found_birthdays_p0.text: No contacts found, with a birthday in the next

print_contact_attr_p0.text: Choose, what you are going to edit

what_to_delete_p0.text: What do you want to delete:

how_to_edit_phone_p0.text: What do you want to do:

remove_attribute_ask_p0.text: Do you really want to delete the

contact_id_not_found.text: There is no contact with this id, try again!

negative_id_error.text: An id cannot be a negative number!

no_phone_numbers_error.text: The contact has no saved phone numbers!

choose_the_phone.text: Choose the phone number you need

contact_remove_submit.text: Are you sure that you want to remove this contact:

print_find_modules_p0.text: Choose, where you want to look for the text

find_hub_intro.text: Specified text found in the next contacts

no_birthday.text: Birthday is not set in this record. Please, use the function for adding birthday instead.

no_email.text: Email is not set in this record. Please, use the function for adding an email instead.

phone_added_p0.text: Phone added. if you want to add another one, enter it in the console. When you are done, just enter '

phone_not_found.text: Haven't found this phone number in the chosen contact!

wrong_month_format_char_num.text: Wrong month format. Should be exactly two characters.

wrong_month_format_out_bound.text: Wrong month format: there can't be more than 12 of them. Correct format: MM-DD-YYYY, or MMDDYYYY.

wrong_day_format_char_num.text: Wrong day format. Should be exactly two characters.

wrong_day_format_out_bound.text: Wrong day format: there can't be more than 31 of them. Correct format: MM-DD-YYYY, or MMDDYYYY.

wrong_year_format_char_num.text: Wrong year format. Should be exactly four characters.

wrong_year_format_out_bound.text: Wrong year format: birthday cannot be in the future. Correct format: MM-DD-YYYY, or MMDDYYYY.

wrong_year_format_days_num.text: Wrong date format: there can't be this many days in the chosen year and month.

incorrect_phone.text: Incorrect phone number. Must be exactly 10 characters, digits only.

wrong_birthday_format.text: Wrong birthday format. The correct format would be: MM-DD-YYYY, or MMDDYYYY.

wrong_email_format.text: Wrong email format. The correct format would be: text@text.text

wrong_title_format.text: Wrong title format: the title cannot be empty.

wrong_text_format.text: Wrong note format: the note cannot be empty.

wrong_tag_format.text: Wrong tag format: the tag cannot be empty.

tag_added_p0.text: Tag added. if you want to add another one, enter it in the console. When you are done, just enter '

create_desc.text: Adds a new record to the note book. You can add a title, text, tags - either when creating a record, or later.

edit_desc.text: Edits the title, or the text of a note.

choose_note.text: number of a note you want to edit

choose_note_to_remove.text: number of a note you want to delete

choose_note_attr.text: what you are going to edit

edit_tags_desc.text: Edits the tags of a note.

choose_note_tag.text: tag you are going to edit

add_tag_desc.text: Add a new tag to the note.

enter_the_tag.text: tag, which you are going to add

find_desc.text: Looks for a specified text in the notes.

remove_tag_desc.text: Deletes one of the tags of the chosen note.

choose_tag_to_del.text: the tag you are going to delete

show_all_desc.text: Displays the contents of the note book.

choose_what_to_edit.text: Choose, what you are going to edit

note_not_found.text: There is no note with this id, try again!

note_remove_submit.text: Are you sure that you want to remove this note:

search_attr_p0.text: Choose, where you want to look for the text

find_intro.text: Specified text found in the next notes

sort_files_desc.text: Sorts all files according to the specified path (including folders and files inside of them), and moves them to the specified directory.

enter_input_folder.text: Please, enter the path to the folder we will be sorting.

enter_output_folder.text: Please, enter the path to the folder, where sorted files will be stored

invalid_path.text: is not a valid folder path! Try again!
